item.description:
7:00-7:30: Introductions, socializing
7:30-8:00: The Basics- meeting times, dates, places
8:00-8:30: Beyond the Basics: Interests, skills, techniques to share- Feel free to bring photos of your artwork, books, DVD's, or instructions on techniques that we can use to brainstorm topics for future meetups.
8:30-8:45: Next Steps- wrap up meeting, next steps.
item.how_to_find_us: Park on the side lot, and enter the front door. Go up the staircase on the right hand side and go to suite #2.
item.why: I am sure we have some great people who can get together to make art, share skills, and have fun. Let's get it together and get this party started!

group.name: The Altered Art and Assemblage Meetup Group

item.name: Assemblage Art Planning Meeting
